select s.school_id schoolId,s.school_name schoolName, s.school_src schoolSrc,s.school_type schoolType, s.school_introduction schoolIntroduction, s.school_url schoolUrl,s.school_img_src schoolImgSrc, s.school_tel schoolTel,s.school_head schoolHead, s.school_time schoolTime,s.school_ranking_size schoolRankingSize, s.school_seach_size schoolSeachSize,s.is_ranking isRanking, s.school_pic schoolPic,p.professional_id professionalId, p.professional_name professionalName,p.college_id collegeId from tb_school s left join tb_professional p on s.school_id = p.school_id where 1=1
and s.school_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{example.schoolName}), '%')
and s.school_src like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{example.schoolSrc}), '%')
and p.professional_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{example.professionalName}), '%')
and s.school_type = #{example.schoolType}
or p.professional_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
order by s.school_time
order by s.school_seach_size desc
order by s.school_ranking_size desc
